titleStmt.title: Lord have mercy upon us This is the humble petition of England unto Alm[ig]hty God, meekely imploring his divine bounty for the cessation of this mortality of pestilence now raigning amongst us: vvith a lamentable list of deaths triumphs in the weekly burials of the city of London, and the parishes adjacent to the same. M.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Thomas Lambert at the signe of the Hors-shoo in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Author's initials appear at end of petition.
Identified as STC 19075 on UMI microfilm; now = STC 19251.3.
Imperfect; some print faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England).

place.placeName: the signe of the Hors-shoo in Smithfield
